alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 5:36AM PST until January 09 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Metaline, Newport, Colville, Deer Park, Metaline Falls, Flowery Trail Road, Fruitland, Springdale-Hunters Road, Kettle Falls, Chewelah, Orin-Rice Road, Northport, Ione, and Tiger. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact travel Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The bulk of the snow accumulations will occur through 9 AM Tuesday. However snow showers and patchy blowing snow can be expected into the afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
